I graduated from UMD Duluth in 2021 with a degree in marketing and ecenomics. I worked in marketing and sales for construction materials providers and construction service companies. Through the comapnies' websites, I was introduced to softare engineering. I was intruiged from the start. The world of software engineering was intersting, challenging, and unqiue. I found it hard to stay away and tuaght myself fundementals on the side.
